All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Constants
Class to handle the constant variables in the project
CurrentTimerContainer
CurrentTimerContainer class which extends Vbox in order to create custom JavaFX elements.
GoalsController
Goals class that won't be implemented Didn't make the final iteration of the project and was in the Could have moscow priority
HelloApplication
Main class for the application
HomeController
Home class to handle the home page Includes methods to handle the navigation events for the pane buttons displays the current loggedin users next to the settings icon.
ISessionsDAO
 
ISqliteConnection
 
IUserDAO
 
LandingController
LandingController class for handling navigation on the landing page application Class handles logging in, signing up a new user, sending the user to the RessetPasswordController to reset user password, and closing the application
NavigationController
NavigationController class to handle navigation through the application Handles user log in, the navigation events on pane button clicks, and delete account logic
ResetPasswordController
Class to handle resetting the user password.
SessionsDAO
An implementation of sessionsDAO.
SessionsDataCollator
SessionsDataCollator class to get the total time of the run timers and current date of the logged-in session
SessionsDataCollator.TotalDailyData
 
SettingsController
SettingsController class to handle navigation of user logging out, resetting their password in the settings view, and deleting their account
SignUpController
SignUpController class to handle user registration, password hashing, and cancel navigation back to the landing-view
SqliteConnection
Sqlite connection class to connect to the boxeyes.db Users logged-in credentials will be stored and saved to the appropriate columns in the DB table
StateManager
State Manager class to direct the process of saving and restoring views between requests
StatisticsController
 
Timer
Timer class to handle the applications timer function handles running time, favourite inputs, deleting timers Includes getters and setters
TimerContainer
TimerContainer class which extends Vbox in order to create custom JavaFX elements.
TimerController
Controller which handles the currently running timer.
TimerDAO
The Data Access Object for the Timer class Creates a Timer DB that is connected to the userID Uses methods to handle creating the timer DB if one doesn't exist, saving timers to the logged users profile, loading the timers for the current logged user, delete the timers from the DB, delete timers from the current logged users added timers, update timers that have been edited, and set the favourite timers to the user profile
TimerDAO.TimersLoadCallback
 
TimersPageController
Class for managing the Timers page
TrayIconController
Class for managing the application's system tray functionality
User
User class that Constructs a new User with specified username, email, and password.
UserDAO
The Data Access Object for the User class.
